Date: Monday, 8/18/1977
Subject: Progress of Ozzie Virgil Jr.
Dear Sir,
Ozzie Virgil Jr. is hitting the ball well at A Tampa Tarpons!
He has an AVG of .314, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
